person.content:

2. Full assembly of the Senate - a collective noun referring to a group of people (a legislative body)

Therefore, there are two "Person" entities in the paragraph.
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Person.

Sure! Here are the entities that clearly refer to a "Person" in the paragraph:

2. Full assembly of the Senate - a collective noun referring to a group of people (a legislative body)

organization.content:
Please identify the "Organization" entities in the following paragraph.

Paragraph: From Tuesday , the full assembly of the Senate will start its examination of the financial package .

Let's think step by step.

In the given paragraph, the following entities can be identified as "Organization" entities:

1. Senate: This is the main organization being referred to in the paragraph. It is a legislative body that is assembling to examine a financial package.
2. Full assembly of the Senate: This is a sub-entity of the Senate, referring to the entire gathering of senators who will be participating in the examination of the financial package.

Therefore, the two Organization entities in the paragraph are:

1. Senate
2. Full assembly of the Senate
Please remove irrelevant entities and only keep the entities that clearly refer to Organization.
